}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Rivet Networks]] '''NGFF525A-L''' 2×2 11ac Wireless Adapter with BT 4.1 :802.11ac 2T2R, Wave2 MU-MIMO, TxBF, 300/867Mbps (2.4/5GHz) {{see also|Rivet Networks|Lite-On|Lite-On WCBN807A}}
===Specifications=== *NGFF (Next Generation Form Factor) M.2, 22x30mm ([http://www.lian-mueller.com/img/NGFF525A-L_Pic.jpg Key A/E]) *Chipset: QCA6174A, 2×2 MU-MIMO with two spatial streams *Single-chip, 2.4/5 GHz, 2 stream 802.11abgn/ac and BT 4.1 :802.11ac 2x2 WLAN, LP PCIe (L1 sub-state) + BT 4.1 (USB1.1) *Supports 20/40MHz (2.4GHz) and supports 20/40/80MHz (5GHz) *Bluetooth 4.1 solution for class1/2 power-level transmissions :Support BT 4.1 + HS, BLE, ANT+ (compatible with BT 1.2, 2.x) :Supports Bluetooth-WLAN coexistence and ISM-LTE coexistence
[[Category:English Documentation]]
